forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. West northwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 60. Northwest wind 2 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight in Downtown San Francisco, the skies present a mostly clear canvas, underpinned by a cooling atmosphere, dipping to around 46 degrees. A gentle west-northwest breeze dances between 6 and 13 mph, bringing with it the occasional gust that reminds one of the city’s spirited character. As the last vestiges of daylight yield to the evening, the charm of the city emerges, illuminated by scattered lights reflecting off the calm waters.

As dawn breaks tomorrow, expect a sun-kissed day ahead, with the promise of warmth peeking near 60 degrees. The gentle northwest winds hold a reassuring presence, likely comforting those strolling through the eclectic streets. Dress in layers; a cozy jacket in the morning is advisable, giving way to lighter attire as the sun fully embraces the day. These conditions invite a leisurely exploration—perhaps a relaxing walk along the Embarcadero, where the bay's vista unfolds in all its glory, or indulging in a café moment while people-watching amidst the vibrant tapestry of city life. Seek the serenity within the bustle; this time of year gifts the mindful urbanite with an array of understated pleasures.
